Description:
Spacious Family Living
This outstanding, quality family home is set on an allotment of 1668m2, in beautiful White Hills - a must to inspect for families.
Experience the complete package, with nothing to do but move in and relax.
This home is sure to impress and delight you from the moment you walk through the front door.
Featuring 3 living areas and 4 large bedrooms, the spacious main bedroom boasting a walk-in robe and light-filled ensuite, with all other bedrooms having built-in robes.
Forming part of a large, open plan living hub, the family-sized kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, gas cooking, and is adjacent to the family and dining area.
This space is perfect for entertaining, with access through a sliding door out to the undercover alfresco.
The home also has a rumpus room/study or home office.
A separate formal lounge for quiet entertaining can be found at the front of the home, and there's a separate area downstairs to get away.
This ensures every family member is well catered for.
Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling takes care of year-round comfort, plus there is a ducted vacuum system, 2 toilets upstairs and one downstairs in the double garage.
Outside finds impressive landscaped, easily maintained gardens, while the huge alfresco area with blinds makes entertaining a breeze.
Side access allows room for caravan, boats or trailers.
A large 9m x 7m shed with power and concrete floor is ready for all the toys.
5000ltr water tank and a 2kw solar system for power saving.
This home is close to everything, yet you'd never know it from its tranquil and peaceful surrounds.
A fantastic location, in a wonderful community and a great lifestyle, only minutes to shops, White Hills Primary School, Creche and sporting facilities. Inspect now!

Description:
Immaculate, Unique, Impressive White Hills
A home with style, flare, customised features filled with warmth and character, this two-storey brick residence is set on an elevated corner allotment of approximately 815m². Charmingly positioned in White Hills only a few minutes' walk to the Botanical Gardens, short drive to White Hills shopping, sporting fields and bush land reserves.
The property offers:
Three extra-large bedrooms, two upstairs bedrooms with ample built in robe storage
Master bedroom on the ground floor is grand by proportions, with a full ensuite & WIR
Central bathroom with corner shower, bath and large vanity basin
Separate toilet located off the fully fitted laundry with sink, hand washing basin and storage cupboards
Ducted Gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout
A centrally located kitchen is the hub of the home with the dining area directly adjacent. The huge living area flows on from the kitchen allowing for open plan living
A second living area/rumpus/office is a versatile area. Being of significant size, this second living zone could be used for home office or easily converted to be a forth bedroom and still allowing enough space for a smaller second loungeroom. Double doors lead you outside to the wonderland of landscaped gardens, entertaining deck and much more
Entertaining deck with merbau timber, built in BBQ, bench space, ceiling fan
Fully landscaped gardens, low maintenance the inspiration behind the design. Featuring garden beds with hearty plant life, shrubs, small trees, rocked areas, timber barn style fence features and much more to discover
The elevated position provides privacy from all angels inside and out of this property
A large concrete driveway at the rear of the property leads up to a double carport and shed with concrete floor & power plus twin roller doors
A shipping container has been converted and neatly positioned behind the shed allowing for weather tight and secure storage
Large front verandah, concrete paths, Colorbond and picket fencing
Quality & immaculate are two words that come to mind when you step into this impressive property, you will not be disappointed.
Inspections by appointment only, enquire today!

Description:
Not Ready For A Unit?
Easy to live in, easy to maintain and offers all the comforts for a safe and comfortable retirement. Features ducted cooling, split system air conditioning, dishwasher and a great outdoor entertaining area, garage, workshop and double carport. This delightful brick veneer home is located in a quiet cul de sac only a short drive to central Bendigo and in walking distance to White Hills shops and the delightful botanical gardens. If you need to downsize, but are not keen to live in a cluster style unit development, you will love this retirement size home.

Description:
OUTSTANDING RENOVATED ‘MINI OASIS’
Positioned conveniently 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD (approx.) you will find this tastefully renovated home.
Surrounded by stunning ‘resort like’ gardens this home features:
• Two good sized bedrooms with robes, master with beautiful views of the magnificent front garden
• Light filled, open plan lounge, kitchen & meals area
• Modern kitchen with all of the essentials - walk in pantry, new freestanding gas cooktop/oven and dishwasher
• Neutral tone bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, large shower, vanity basin & toilet
• White washed floor boards in living areas and new carpet in both bedrooms
• Study nook
• Evaporative cooling throughout, electric heating
• Side access gate to the 6m x 3m (approx.) shed with concrete floor
This charming home has been entirely renovated and is ready for new owners to enjoy – Inspection an absolute must to enjoy the true beauty of this property.

Description:
Renovated home, with the added bonus of a bungalow.
This beautiful home features a superb, modern kitchen with high end appliances, 2 ovens and loads of cupboards and drawers, separate butler's pantry plus a walk in pantry. The home also offers a separate lounge, a rumpus room/2nd living area, 4 spacious bedrooms and a beautifully renovated family bathroom. Zoned ducted heating and cooling plus split systems provide climate control. Step outside to a decked entertaining area, and a separate, renovated bungalow that is very private, which is ideal as a teenage retreat, a place to host over night guests or that extra family member. To complete this fabulous home there is a paved entertaining area, a double garage with internal access plus solar panels. All this on a spacious block, close to schools, shops, recreation reserves, public transport and a short drive to the centre of Bendigo.

Description:
Timeless Charmer!
A home full of traditional character, this striking double brick residence offers perfect urban comfort amidst it's glorious ambiance.
From the inviting entrance, internally to the left of the hallway you move into the spacious living room which allows you to flow through to the kitchen and meals area, a beautiful light filled space and ideal for everyday living, three bedrooms, 2 of which include ceiling fans, and all serviced by the centrally located bathroom, a second toilet is also conveniently located of the separate laundry area. The gas heater in the living room keeps the home cosy throughout the cooler months.
Polished floorboards, high ceilings, decorative cornice, stunning light fitting are all complimented with neutral colours throughout, that make this home very warming.
Outside you will be delighted by the space on offer which has been beautifully landscaped. The rear yard includes a lush grassed area, garden beds complete with standard roses, a generous paved area and a delightful alfresco entertaining space. Positioned on a good-size allotment with off-street parking complete with carport and minimal maintenance yard, this one is not to be missed!
This extremely neat and tidy home that has been perfectly kept and maintained and is located only meters from shops, public transport at your door step, minutes from schools, sporting grounds and handy to Epsom Village shops. Be quick to inspect, this property certainly will not disappoint!

Description:
Astute investor & family home seeker alert!
A fantastic family home is what you'll find when you step through the front door at this address, an attribute echoed throughout the property. Able to be entirely separated, 2 living zones include parent's lounge and a study or nursery, aptly positioned near the master bedroom.
Beautiful timber laminate floor leads the way across an open plan zone into the kitchen where a dishwasher, electric wall oven and gas cooktop can be put to work. Space for a full-size side by side fridge and freezer is a thoughtful inclusion here too. A generous supply of storage starts with the corner pantry and large linen cupboards. However, it doesn't end with walk-in and built-in robes for all 3 bedrooms or roomy ensuite vanity. Ducted heating and cooling add constant comfort.
Revel in year-round outdoor living, sheltered by an undercover alfresco area, cocooned within patio blinds or roll-up to catch the evening breeze. A double carport has cars covered and grants access to the big fenced backyard. The residence sits on just over 800m2, surrounded by a virtually mow-only blank canvas, ready for you to paint your own version of a picture-perfect garden. Offering shade for children at play and pets on a hot summer day, a few established trees are a welcome asset.
Even the location is family-friendly in a quiet court very close to pre- and primary schools, botanic gardens, shops, swimming pool, buses into Bendigo plus secondary college and multiple other conveniences.
A smart choice for an astute investor or savvy family home seeker, this property is sure to prove popular!
Insights: 2 Watts Court, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Address: 117 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
As new, affordable and adorable.
This four-year old brick veneer home is one of the neatest, sweetest and most complete packages on offer. The perfect nest for couples, downsizers or young families includes a front portico with feature stone-stacked pillars and a free-flowing layout.
Accommodation includes three bedrooms, two bathrooms and spacious open living and dining areas adjoining the kitchen. Galley-style kitchen is equipped with gas/electric cooking, dishwasher, corner pantry and lengthy breakfast bar separating it from the dining area where sliding doors open to a covered alfresco.
Added features include neutral décor, chic bathrooms, ducted heating and cooling and premium storage with robes to all bedrooms (walk-in to main), double linen, broom closet, double hallway cupboard and laundry bench.
The double garage has remote roller door, double doors opening to the backyard and the added convenience of personal access direct to the residence.
Sited on a compact allotment approx 352m² with easy-care landscaping and situated practically alongside the walkway to Kennewell Street with foot access to The Bendigo Linear Path, Bendigo Botanic Gardens, White Hills Swimming Pool and private and public primary schools.
Forget building, this one is all done for you!

Description:
Beautiful Today, Brilliant Tomorrow
The generous family proportions of this desirably situated four bedroom home, entirely user friendly today, are accompanied by a 574sqm allotment, in the lquite street setting opposite parkland expanses and bike paths. Open living and kitchen/dining spaces convey the modern
comfort created by previous updating before revealing a low maintenance garden and entertaining area, currently accompanied by convenient secure storage sheds and convenient off street car parking. An ideal example of a property where the present day appeal and the further family potential form an irresistible partnership.
Insights: 19 Hamelin Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Address: 108 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Investors Only - Tenant in place until Dec 2018
This 3 bedroom brick veneer home is set on a fully fenced, 924m2 (approx.) allotment & offers all the outdoor space you need plus a great undercover entertainment area & a large double garage/shed/workshop.
Inside features a split system reverse cycle air conditioner, Coonara wood heater & a ceiling fan in the spacious lounge, dishwasher, built in pantry & gas cooking in the modern kitchen, BIRs to all bedrooms (with a ceiling fan in the main), 3 piece bathroom & a separate toilet. There is also a handy, additional small living/study/formal dining area just off the hallway. The property is situated close to schools & parkland & there's even a cubby house in the back yard for the kids to enjoy. Currently tenanted at $290 per week until December 2018.
Insights: 108 St Killian Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.
